name: Lab Report
description:
This is a proof-of-concept for a puzzle platformer game. Currently, the game only has 10 levels and can be beaten in a few minutes. If the game is well received, in the future I'll consider remaking/updating it into a bigger, full length game.

Until then, download, play, and enjoy! I've poured weeks of effort into this one, and to date it's my most polished, well-crafted game yet. Of course, whether it's good or not is for you to judge.

As usual, feel free to comment any critiques, bugs, or just general feedback! I really appreciate it, and it helps my make my games better.

Anyways, I hope you enjoy..... LAB REPORT!
